credentials.title: Authentication *
credentials.description: Choose how to authenticate to Mixpanel

username.title: Username
username.description: Mixpanel Service Account Username. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this.

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: Mixpanel Service Account Secret. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this.

project_id.title: Project ID
project_id.description: Your project ID number. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this.

api_secret.title: Project Secret
api_secret.description: Mixpanel project secret. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this.

attribution_window.title: Attribution Window
attribution_window.description: A period of time for attributing results to ads and the lookback period after those actions occur during which ad results are counted. Default attribution window is 5 days. (This value should be non-negative integer)

project_timezone.title: Project Timezone
project_timezone.description: Time zone in which integer date times are stored. The project timezone may be found in the project settings in the Mixpanel console.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Any data before this date will not be replicated. If this option is not set, the connector will replicate data from up to one year ago by default.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The date in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Any data after this date will not be replicated. Left empty to always sync to most recent date

region.title: Region
region.description: The region of mixpanel domain instance either US or EU.

date_window_size.title: Date slicing window
date_window_size.description: Defines window size in days, that used to slice through data. You can reduce it, if amount of data in each window is too big for your environment. (This value should be positive integer)

minimal_cohort_members_properties.title: Minimal Cohort Members properties
minimal_cohort_members_properties.description: Set to TRUE to capture only the minimal properties for the cohort members binding. Typically left as the default.

resourceConfigSchema.title: ResourceConfig
resourceConfigSchema.description: ResourceConfig encodes a configured resource stream

syncMode.title: Sync Mode
syncMode.description: Sync this resource incrementally, or fully refresh it every run

namespace.title: Namespace
namespace.description: Enclosing schema namespace of this resource
